Html:
Hi,

It's been a while since I updated this control, but figured I would spend some time doing it now.

I used to have this code:

 

Public Class MarkerOverlay
    Inherits GMapOverlay
    ..
    ..

    Protected Overrides Sub DrawToolTip(ByVal g As Graphics, ByVal m As GMapMarker, ByVal x As Integer, ByVal y As Integer)
    ..

 

But now it seams like this method is no more. What to do then? I've tried looking through the samples, but couldn't find a sample where inherting from GMapOverlay and handling the tooltip.

Thanks in advance!

Mojo
now each marker contains ToolTip instance of type GMapToolTip, you can create custom tooltips as well
